00049 /*****************************************************************************/
00050 /**
00051  * MarkerRowComp::operato()
00052  *
00053  * Used in the STL std::sort for sorting MarkerRow objects.
00054  * Sort order is experiment -> gene -> probeSet.
00055  *
00056  *
00057  * @param  a,b - the two MarkerRow objects to compare.
00058  * @return true - if ( a < b);
00059  *
00060  */
00061 /*****************************************************************************/
00062 bool MarkerRowComp::operator()(const MarkerRow &a,
00063                                const MarkerRow &b) const
00064 {
00065 
00066   if (a.m_experiment != b.m_experiment) {
00067     return(a.m_experiment.compare(b.m_experiment) <= 0);
00068   }
00069 
00070   if (a.m_gene != b.m_gene) {
00071     return(a.m_gene.compare(b.m_gene) <= 0);
00072   }
00073 
00074   return (a.m_probeSet.compare(b.m_probeSet) <= 0);
00075 
00076 }
00077 // end MarkerRowComp::operator
00078 /*****************************************************************************/
00079 /*****************************************************************************/
00080 /**
00081  * MarkerExperimentReport::close:
00082  * Synopsis:
00083  *
00084  *   Close the Marker report file.
00085  *
00086  * @return - void, closes report files.
00087  */
00088 /*****************************************************************************/
00089 bool MarkerExperimentReport::close(bool abort)
00090 {
00091 
00092   if (! abort) {
00093     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "MarkerExperimentReport::generate called: ", false);
00094     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL,  m_reportName);
00095   }
00096 
00097   if (m_open_called) {
00098     m_marker_tsv.close();
00099     m_open_called = false;
00100   }
00101 
00102   return true;
00103 
00104 }
00105 // end MarkerExperimentReport::close
00106 /*****************************************************************************/
00107 /*****************************************************************************/
00108 /**
00109  * _report_marker
00110  * Synopsis:
00111  *
00112  * Helper function for one time use by MarkerExperimentReport::generate.
00113  *
00114  * Write a tab delimited record to the output TSV file for marker data.
00115  *
00116  * @param marker_tsv - the TsvFile reference
00117  * @param mRow - the MarkerRow class defined just for this report.
00118  *
00119  */
00120 /*****************************************************************************/
00121 static void _report_marker(affx::TsvFile & marker_tsv, const MarkerRow & mRow)
00122 {
00123 
00124   // here we expect things to be in the order defined above.
00125   // otherwise we could say: m_tsv.set(0,"experiment",m_experiment);
00126   marker_tsv.set(0, 0,  mRow.m_experiment);
00127   marker_tsv.set(0, 1,  mRow.m_gene);
00128   marker_tsv.set(0, 2,  mRow.m_sample);
00129   marker_tsv.set(0, 3,  mRow.m_functionalChange);
00130   marker_tsv.set(0, 4,  mRow.m_externalId);
00131   marker_tsv.set(0, 5,  mRow.m_probeSet);
00132   marker_tsv.set(0, 6,  mRow.m_baseCall);
00133   marker_tsv.set(0, 7,  mRow.m_referenceBase);
00134   marker_tsv.set(0, 8,  mRow.m_variantBase);
00135   marker_tsv.set(0, 9,  mRow.m_call);
00136   marker_tsv.set(0, 10, mRow.m_haplotypeMarker);
00137   marker_tsv.set(0, 11, mRow.m_changeForVariant);
00138   marker_tsv.set(0, 12, mRow.m_variantCDNAChange);
00139   marker_tsv.set(0, 13, mRow.m_variantDNAChange);
00140   marker_tsv.set(0, 14, mRow.m_dbSNPId);
00141   marker_tsv.set(0, 15, mRow.m_validated);
00142   marker_tsv.set(0, 16, mRow.m_alleleDefiningMarker);
00143   marker_tsv.set(0, 17, mRow.m_relevantAlleles);
00144 
00145   marker_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00146 
00147   return;
00148 }
00149 // end _report_marker
00150 /*****************************************************************************/
00151 /*****************************************************************************/
00152 /**
00153  * MarkerExperimentReport::generate
00154  *
00155  * Create the report this object was made for.
00156  * As with all other report objects the data is generated one experiment
00157  * at a time.
00158  *
00159  *
00160  * @param rte - the single instnace RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00161  * @param ttm - the single instance translation table model
00162  * @param er  - the container for all experiment results.
00163  *
00164  * @return true - when report was generated as expected.
00165  *
00166  */
00167 /*****************************************************************************/
00168 bool MarkerExperimentReport::generate(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00169                                       class TranslationTableModel & ttm,
00170                                       std::map<std::string, ExperimentResults *>&er)
00171 {
00172 
00173   bool okReport = true;
00174 
00175 
00176   if (! m_open_called) {
00177     open(rte);
00178   }
00179 
00180 
00181   //std::sort(m_results.begin(), m_results.end());
00182   int count = 0;
00183 
00184 
00185   std::map<std::string, ExperimentResults*>::const_iterator itSER;
00186 
00187   // For each experiment, recapitulate the translation table.
00188 
00189   for (itSER = er.begin(); (itSER != er.end()) && okReport ;  itSER++) {
00190 
00191     // IGNORE Experiments with no marker calls for DMET2.
00192     if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling && (itSER->second->m_markerCallCount == 0)) {
00193       continue;
00194     }
00195 
00196     std::vector<MarkerRow> mRows;
00197     std::map<std::string, int> probeSetRow;
00198 
00199     for (int i = 1; i < ttm.size(); i++, count++) {
00200 
00201       // Skip commented out rows as well as header rows.
00202       if (ttm.ignoreRow(i) || (!((ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_HAPLOTYPE)] == "Y") || (ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_HAPLOTYPE)] == "N")))) {
00203         continue;
00204       }
00205 
00206 
00207       std::string gene = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENE)];
00208 
00209       ExperimentGeneResults *egr = NULL;
00210 
00211       if (itSER->second->m_geneResults.find(gene) != itSER->second->m_geneResults.end()) {
00212         egr = itSER->second->m_geneResults[gene];
00213       }
00214 
00215 
00216       MarkerRow mRowNew;
00217       MarkerRow * mRow = &mRowNew;
00218       std::string probeSet = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_PROBE_SET_ID)];
00219 
00220       bool isMultiAllelicRow = probeSetRow.count(probeSet) > 0;
00221       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00222         APT_ERR_ASSERT(probeSetRow[probeSet] < mRows.size(), "");
00223         mRow = &(mRows[probeSetRow[probeSet]]);
00224       } else {
00225         probeSetRow[probeSet] = mRows.size();
00226       }
00227 
00228       bool isProbeSetPresent = false;
00229       if (egr != NULL) {
00230         isProbeSetPresent
00231         = egr->m_probeSetToMarkerCallResults.count(probeSet) > 0;
00232       }
00233 
00234       int markerCallResultsIndex = 0;
00235       bool hasAlleleCalls = false;
00236       if (isProbeSetPresent) {
00237         markerCallResultsIndex = egr->m_probeSetToMarkerCallResults[probeSet];
00238         hasAlleleCalls =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_alleleCalls.size() > 0;
00239       }
00240 
00241       // EXPERIMENT
00242       mRow->m_experiment  = itSER->first;
00243 
00244       // GENE
00245       mRow->m_gene       = gene;
00246 
00247       // SAMPLE
00248       mRow->m_sample     = itSER->second->m_sample;
00249 
00250       // FUNCTIONAL CHANGE
00251       mRow->m_functionalChange = "";
00252 
00253       // EXTERNAL ID
00254       mRow->m_externalId = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_COMMON_NAME)];
00255 
00256       // PROBE SET
00257       mRow->m_probeSet = probeSet;
00258 
00259       // REFERENCE BASE
00260       mRow->m_referenceBase = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)];
00261       // VARIANT BASE
00262       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00263         mRow->m_variantBase = mRow->m_variantBase + "," + ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)];
00264       } else {
00265         mRow->m_variantBase = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)];
00266       }
00267 
00268       // CALL
00269       mRow->m_call = "";
00270       if (isProbeSetPresent && (egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_alleleCalls.size() > 0)) {
00271         APT_ERR_ASSERT(markerCallResultsIndex < egr->m_callResults.size(), "");
00272         APT_ERR_ASSERT(egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_alleleCalls.size() > 0, "");
00273         mRow->m_call = egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_alleleCalls[0].m_allele;
00274       }
00275 
00276       // BASE CALL
00277 
00278       if (!isMultiAllelicRow) {
00279         mRow->m_baseCall = "NotAvailable";
00280       }
00281 
00282       if (isProbeSetPresent) {
00283         if ((egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.size() > 0) && (egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.size() > 0) && egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0] == "PRA") {
00284           mRow->m_baseCall = "PossibleRareAllele";
00285         }
00286 
00287         if (mRow->m_call == "Ref/Ref") {
00288           mRow->m_baseCall = mRow->m_referenceBase + "/" + mRow->m_referenceBase;
00289         } else if (mRow->m_call == "Ref/Var") {
00290           std::string variance =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00291           if (variance ==  mRow->m_referenceBase) {
00292             variance =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid2.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00293           }
00294           if (variance == ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)]) {
00295             mRow->m_baseCall = mRow->m_referenceBase + "/" + variance;
00296           }
00297         } else if (mRow->m_call == "Var/Var") {
00298           std::string variance1 =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00299           if (variance1 == ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)]) {
00300             std::string variance2 =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid2.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00301             mRow->m_baseCall = variance1 + "/" + variance2 ;
00302           }
00303         } else if (egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0] == "NC") {
00304           mRow->m_baseCall = "NoCall";
00305         }
00306       }
00307 
00308       // HAPLOTYPE MARKER
00309       mRow->m_haplotypeMarker = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_HAPLOTYPE)];
00310 
00311       // CHANGE FOR VARIANT
00312       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00313         if (mRow->m_changeForVariant.empty()) {
00314           mRow->m_changeForVariant = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CHANGE)];
00315         } else if (! ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CHANGE)].empty() && (mRow->m_changeForVariant != ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CHANGE)])) {
00316 
00317           mRow->m_changeForVariant = mRow->m_changeForVariant + "," + ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CHANGE)];
00318         }
00319 
00320       } else {
00321         mRow->m_changeForVariant = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CHANGE)];
00322       }
00323 
00324       // VARIANT CDNA CHANGE
00325       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00326         if (mRow->m_variantCDNAChange.empty()) {
00327           mRow->m_variantCDNAChange = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CDNA)];
00328         } else if (!ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CDNA)].empty()) {
00329           mRow->m_variantCDNAChange = mRow->m_variantCDNAChange + "," + ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CDNA)];
00330         }
00331       } else  {
00332         mRow->m_variantCDNAChange = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_CDNA)];
00333       }
00334 
00335       // VARIANT DNA CHANGE
00336       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00337         if (mRow->m_variantDNAChange.empty()) {
00338           mRow->m_variantDNAChange = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENOME_POSITION)];
00339         } else if (!ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENOME_POSITION)].empty()) {
00340           mRow->m_variantDNAChange = mRow->m_variantDNAChange + "," + ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENOME_POSITION)];
00341         }
00342       } else {
00343         mRow->m_variantDNAChange = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENOME_POSITION)];
00344       }
00345 
00346       // DBSNP ID
00347       mRow->m_dbSNPId = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DBSNP)];
00348 
00349       // VALIDATED
00350       mRow->m_validated = ttm.m_rows[i][ADT_DMET2_TT_VALIDATED];
00351       // ALLELE DEFINING MARKER
00352       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00353         if (mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker.empty()) {
00354           mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DEFINING)];
00355         } else  if (!ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DEFINING)].empty() && (mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker != ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DEFINING)])) {
00356           mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker = mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker + "," + ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DEFINING)];
00357         }
00358       } else {
00359         mRow->m_alleleDefiningMarker = ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_DEFINING)];
00360       }
00361 
00362       // RELEVANT ALLELES
00363       int headerRow = 0;
00364 
00365       for (headerRow = i - 1; headerRow >= 0; headerRow--) {
00366         if (headerRow == 0) break;
00367         if (ttm.m_rows[headerRow][0] != mRow->m_gene)  {
00368           headerRow++;
00369           break;
00370         }
00371       }
00372 
00373       std::string relevantAlleles;
00374       int relevantAllelesIndex = ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT);
00375       for (int j = ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_ALLELE_START) + 1; j < ttm.m_rows[i].size(); j++) {
00376         if ((mRow->m_haplotypeMarker == "N") || (ttm.m_rows[headerRow][j].c_str())[0] != '#') {
00377           if (ttm.m_rows[i][j].empty()) {
00378             if (j == ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_ALLELE_START))  {
00379               relevantAlleles = ttm.m_rows[headerRow][j] + ",";
00380             }
00381           } else   {
00382             relevantAllelesIndex = j;
00383             relevantAlleles = relevantAlleles + ttm.m_rows[headerRow][j] + ",";
00384           }
00385         }
00386       }
00387       if (!relevantAlleles.empty()) {
00388         relevantAlleles.resize(relevantAlleles.size() - 1);
00389       }
00390       if (isMultiAllelicRow) {
00391         if (! relevantAlleles.empty()) {
00392           mRow->m_relevantAlleles = mRow->m_relevantAlleles  + "," + relevantAlleles;
00393         }
00394       } else {
00395         mRow->m_relevantAlleles = relevantAlleles;
00396       }
00397 
00398       if (isProbeSetPresent && !relevantAlleles.empty() && (mRow->m_haplotypeMarker == "N")  && (ttm.m_rows[i][relevantAllelesIndex] ==  ttm.m_rows[i][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)])) {
00399 
00400         std::string variance1 =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid1.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00401         std::string variance2 =  egr->m_callResults[markerCallResultsIndex].m_experimentChromatid2.m_ceSet.begin()->second.m_bases[0];
00402         if ((mRow->m_call == "Var/Var")) {
00403 
00404           if (mRow->m_functionalChange.empty()) {
00405             if (mRow->m_relevantAlleles.find(",") != std::string::npos) {
00406               std::string firstAllele = mRow->m_relevantAlleles.substr(0, mRow->m_relevantAlleles.find(","));
00407               mRow->m_functionalChange = firstAllele + "/" + firstAllele;
00408             } else {
00409               mRow->m_functionalChange = mRow->m_relevantAlleles  + "/" + mRow->m_relevantAlleles;
00410             }
00411           } else {
00412             mRow->m_functionalChange = mRow->m_functionalChange.substr(0, mRow->m_functionalChange.find("/"))  + "/" + relevantAlleles;
00413           }
00414           if ((variance1 != variance2) &&
00415               (mRow->m_relevantAlleles.find(",") != std::string::npos)) {
00416             mRow->m_functionalChange = mRow->m_relevantAlleles;
00417           }
00418         } else if (mRow->m_call == "Ref/Var") {
00419           mRow->m_functionalChange = mRow->m_relevantAlleles;
00420           if (mRow->m_relevantAlleles.find(",") != std::string::npos) {
00421             mRow->m_functionalChange =  mRow->m_relevantAlleles.substr(0 , mRow->m_relevantAlleles.find(","));
00422           }
00423 
00424         }
00425       }
00426 
00427       if (!isMultiAllelicRow) {
00428         mRows.push_back(*mRow);
00429       }
00430 
00431 
00432     } //for each translation table model marker
00433 
00434     for (size_t j = 0; j < mRows.size(); j++) {
00435       _report_marker(m_marker_tsv, mRows[j]);
00436     }
00437 
00438   } // for each gene, experiment result
00439 
00440   return okReport;
00441 
00442 }
00443 // end MarkerExperimentReport::generate
00444 /*****************************************************************************/
00445 /*****************************************************************************/
00446 /**
00447  * MarkerExperimentReport::getMarkerReportName
00448  * Synopsis:
00449  *
00450  * Create the Marker file name from various constant and runtime
00451  * environment settings.
00452  *
00453  *
00454  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00455  *
00456  * @return fileName - the name of the marker report file to use.
00457  *
00458  */
00459 /*****************************************************************************/
00460 std::string MarkerExperimentReport::getMarkerReportName(const class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00461 {
00462 
00463   std::string markerFileName;
00464   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile != "") {
00465     markerFileName = Fs::basename(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile);
00466     markerFileName = markerFileName.substr(0, markerFileName.find('.'));
00467   } else {
00468     markerFileName = name();
00469   }
00470 
00471 
00472   markerFileName = Fs::join(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir,
00473                             markerFileName+".dmet3_"+ADT_VERSION+"."+MARKER_FILE_EXT);
00474 
00475   m_reportName = markerFileName;
00476 
00477   return markerFileName;
00478 
00479 }
00480 // end MarkerExperimentReport::getMarkerReportName
00481 /*****************************************************************************/
00482 /*****************************************************************************/
00483 /**
00484  * MarkerExperimentReport::open
00485  * Synopsis:
00486  *
00487  * Open the TSV file for output.
00488  *
00489  *
00490  * @param rte - the single instance run time environment.
00491  */
00492 /*****************************************************************************/
00493 void MarkerExperimentReport::open(const class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00494 {
00495 
00496   m_guid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00497 
00498   // describe our columns.
00499   for (int i = 0; i < NUM_MARKER_TSV_COLUMNS; i++) {
00500     m_marker_tsv.defineColumn(0, i, MARKER_TSV_COLUMNS[i]);
00501   }
00502 
00503   m_marker_tsv.addHeaderComment(" For research use only. Not for diagnostic purposes.");
00504   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("Version", ADT_VERSION);
00505   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("Date", Util::getTimeStamp());
00506   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("CopyNumberFile", rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile);
00507   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("TranslatTableFile", rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile);
00508   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("DMET3File", rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile);
00509   m_marker_tsv.addHeader("dmet3-report-guid", m_guid);
00510 
00511   std::string markerName = getMarkerReportName(rte);
00512 
00513   m_marker_tsv.writeTsv_v1(markerName);
00514   m_open_called = true;
00515   return;
00516 
00517 }
